mbrq

Stories at the stroke of your keys.

I Lied. mbrq isn't actually a game. It's a system. It's a little program that runs in the terminal, and plays choose your own adventure stories. It's all open souce, so everyone can write stories to play and share.

Story-file Format Specs 

	
	#[storyTitle].mbrq

	0 // number of the story node
	>>> // begin content of the node
	name:[name] // name of the location
	environment:[name] // name of the environment
	time: [0 - 3] // 0 -> morning, 1 -> day, 2 -> evening, 3 -> night
	optionA:"[message]"
	optionAPath: 0, 1, 2, ... // number of the node this option goes to
	(repeat this for option(Path) B and C)
	<<< // end node content

	1
	>>>
	...
